pullrequest.title: Migrate all raw assert calls to GZ_ASSERT (issue #499)

content.raw: One more thing; I just noticed this one doesn't have a message. The documentation says this function returns false if [the curve is not an orientable manifold](http://gts.sourceforge.net/reference/gts-boolean-operations.html#GTS-SURFACE-INTER-CHECK), so I added a message to that effect in ae95d6ee19c4 (also branch migration_to_gzassert_scpeters).
content.html: One more thing; I just noticed this one doesn't have a message. The documentation says this function returns false if the curve is not an orientable manifold, so I added a message to that effect in ae95d6ee19c4 (also branch migration_to_gzassert_scpeters).
